Review Text: This is one of the places I always visit when I‚Äôm in Amsterdam, which is quite often. The staff seem passionate about their products and well informed. I usually just get the bocadillos, but have had a few of their platters as well. I‚Äôve ‚Ä¶

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Great little cafe and shop selling Spanish ham. Take_a_way food seemed very popular with locals. I had a coffee & croissant with ham...both were delicious and inexpensive. Highly recommended for coffee and Spanish ham on baggete, bread & croissants.

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: It offered great meats (Jamon or Hamon in Spanish), friendly stuff, deep knowledge and amazing collection. A hidden gem in Amsterdam. I was so impressed that I tried again in Rotterdam Markthal. Cheers!!!

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Passionate specialists. Best ham around. A must try!

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Absolutely delicious Jam√≥n. They have a large variety of ham and Spanish cheese. The staff is very knowledgeable. They take their time explaining the different types of ham and how the process goes to get the unique flavor. I definitely recommend it.

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Great quality and fresh but overexpensive. How can you charge 7 plus Euro for a ciabatta with minimal amount of ham? You will see great increase in sales by reducing the price. You also can't eat there if you work in the morning, It only opens at 10am and closes at 6pm. Not even 8 hours...

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Just one peek in the window to watch them slice up some delicious looking, thinly sliced meats was all we needed to try it out. It was as good as it looked. If you like meat and are not a vegetarian, this is the place for you!

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Top ham in amsterdam!! A bit expensive but it is totally worth it!

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Super fantastic! Go and eat here!

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: Excellent for grabbing a quick and tasty lunch. A typical Spanish ciabatta with "jamon y queso" for a very good price. Quick service and friendly staff. Also very good for small-medium groups.

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: I had eaten lunch right before finding Ibericus Amsterdam, but the smell of the shop and the sandwiches in the window spoke to me. It was the best decision of my day. I don't even remember were I had lunch before the sandwich.

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: It's not bad, but far from exceptional. The Chorizo Iberico was pretty fatty and without much flavour, pretty disappointing to be honest. There was an jamon Iberco ham with focaccia bread that I thought was pretty good however. I'd try somewhere else to be honest.

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
Review Text: I love this place! If you like Spanish style ham there probably isn't a better place in the Netherlands to go to. Best option is to go for a late lunch when there is much less people.

Name: Ibericus Amsterdam
